verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1684><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ship <S%G4143><s%> He Passed Over <S%G1276><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> His Own <S%G2398><s%> City. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> They Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Paralytic <S%G3885><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> A Bed <S%G2825><s%> Lying; <S%G906><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Their Faith <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> Be Of Good Courage, <S%G2293><s%> Child; <S%G5043><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Thy Sins. <S%G4675><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Lo, <S%G2400><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Blasphemes. <S%G987><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> For Which <S%G1063><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Easier, <S%G2123><s%> To Say, <S%G2036><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thy Sins, <S%G266><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Say, <S%G2036><s%> Arise <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walk? <S%G4043><s%>

<S%G2443><s%> But That <S%G1161><s%> Ye May Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> To Forgive <S%G863><s%> Sins : <S%G266><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> Having Arisen, <S%G1453><s%> Take Up <S%G142><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bed, <S%G2825><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> Thy. <S%G4675><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Arisen <S%G1453><s%> He Went Away <S%G565><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> His House. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%>, Wondered, <S%G2296><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Such <S%G5108><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Passing <S%G3855><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> Saw <S%G1492><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Office, <S%G5058><s%> Matthew <S%G3156><s%> Called, <S%G3004><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Arisen <S%G450><s%> He Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> At His <S%G846><s%> Reclining At Table <S%G345><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> That <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Were Reclining At Table With <S%G4873><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen It <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Eats <S%G2068><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1320><s%> Your Teacher? <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Strong <S%G2480><s%> Of A Physician, <S%G2395><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Ill <S%G2560><s%> Are. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G4198><s%> But Having Gone <S%G1161><s%> Learn <S%G3129><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> I Desire, <S%G2309><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Sacrifice : <S%G2378><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> I Came <S%G2064><s%> To Call <S%G2564><s%> Righteous Ones <S%G1342><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Come Near <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Of John, <S%G2491><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> We <S%G2249><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Do Fast <S%G3522><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Fast Not? <S%G3522><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3361><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Bridechamber <S%G3567><s%> <S%G3996><s%> ' Mourn <S%G1909><s%> While <S%G3745><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom? <S%G3566><s%> Will Come <S%G2064><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Will Have Been Taken Away <S%G522><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> They Will Fast. <S%G3522><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> But No One <S%G1161><s%> Puts <S%G1911><s%> A Piece <S%G1915><s%> Of Cloth <S%G4470><s%> Unfulled <S%G46><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G2440><s%> An Old Garment : <S%G3820><s%> Takes Away <S%G142><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4138><s%> Its Filling Up <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Garment, <S%G2440><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Worse <S%G5501><s%> Rent <S%G4978><s%> Takes Place. <S%G1096><s%>

Nor <S%G3761><s%> Put They <S%G906><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> New <S%G3501><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Skins <S%G779><s%> <S%G3820><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Old, <S%G1161><s%>, Otherwise <S%G3361><s%> Are Burst <S%G4486><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Skins, <S%G779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> Is Poured Out, <S%G1632><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Skins <S%G779><s%> Will Be Destroyed; <S%G622><s%> But <S%G235><s%> They Put <S%G906><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> New <S%G3501><s%> The <S%G1519><s%> Skins <S%G779><s%>, New, <S%G2537><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Both <S%G297><s%> Are Preserved Together. <S%G4933><s%>

<S%G5023><s%> These Things <S%G846><s%> As He Is Speaking <S%G2980><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Ruler <S%G758><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2364><s%> My Daughter <S%G3450><s%> Just Now <S%G737><s%> Has Died; <S%G5053><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Lay <S%G2007><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Thy Hand <S%G4675><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%>, Her, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> She Shall Live. <S%G2198><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Arisen <S%G1453><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Woman <S%G1135><s%> Having Had A Flux Of Blood <S%G131><s%> Twelve <S%G1427><s%> Years, <S%G2094><s%> Having Come <S%G4334><s%> Behind <S%G3693><s%> Touched <S%G680><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Border <S%G2899><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Of His Garment. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> For She Said <S%G1063><s%> Within <S%G1722><s%> Herself, <S%G1438><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> I Shall Touch <S%G680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Garment <S%G2440><s%> His <S%G846><s%> I Shall Be Cured. <S%G4982><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Turned <S%G1994><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Her <S%G846><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Be Of Good Courage, <S%G2293><s%> Daughter; <S%G2364><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Thy Faith <S%G4675><s%> Hath Cured <S%G4982><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Was Cured <S%G4982><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Woman <S%G1135><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5610><s%> That Hour. <S%G1565><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ruler, <S%G758><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flute Players <S%G834><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Making A Tumult, <S%G2350><s%>

Says <S%G3004><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> Withdraw, <S%G402><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Is Dead <S%G599><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Damsel, <S%G2877><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Sleeps. <S%G2518><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Laughed At <S%G2606><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3753><s%> But When <S%G1161><s%> Had Been Put Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> He Took Hold <S%G2902><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5495><s%> Of Her Hand, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Arose <S%G1453><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Damsel. <S%G2877><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Passing On <S%G3855><s%> Thence <S%G1564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> Blind Men, <S%G5185><s%> Crying <S%G2896><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Have Pity On <S%G1653><s%> Us, <S%G2248><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of David. <S%G1138><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> And Having Come <S%G1161><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> Came <S%G4334><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blind Men, <S%G5185><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Believe Ye <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> I Am Able <S%G1410><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> To Do? <S%G4160><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Yea, <S%G3483><s%> Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Touched <S%G680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> Their Eyes, <S%G846><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith <S%G5216><s%> Be It <S%G1096><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Opened <S%G455><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eyes; <S%G3788><s%> Not <S%G2532><s%> Strictly Charged <S%G1690><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> See <S%G3708><s%> No One <S%G3367><s%> Let Know It <S%G1097><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> But They <S%G1161><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> Made Known <S%G1310><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3650><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> That. <S%G1565><s%>

<S%G846><s%> And As They <S%G1161><s%> Were Going Out, <S%G1831><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> They Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Dumb, <S%G2974><s%> Possessed By A Demon. <S%G1139><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demon, <S%G1140><s%> Spake <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Dumb. <S%G2974><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds, <S%G3793><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Was It Seen <S%G5316><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Said, <S%G3004><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prince <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> He Casts Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Went About <S%G4013><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cities <S%G4172><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Villages, <S%G2968><s%> Teaching <S%G1321><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Their Synagogues, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Proclaiming <S%G2784><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glad Tidings <S%G2098><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom, <S%G932><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Healing <S%G2323><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Disease <S%G3554><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Bodily Weakness <S%G3119><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People. <S%G2992><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> He Was Moved With Compassion <S%G4697><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Wearied <S%G1590><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cast Away <S%G4496><s%> As <S%G5616><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> A Shepherd. <S%G4166><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Indeed <S%G3303><s%> Harvest <S%G2326><s%>, Is Great, <S%G4183><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Workmen <S%G2040><s%> Are Few; <S%G3641><s%>

Supplicate <S%G1189><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Harvest, <S%G2326><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> He May Send Out <S%G1544><s%> Workmen <S%G2040><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2326><s%> His Harvest. <S%G846><s%>
